DOC.HEAD: EC Send Medical Aid to Poland
With AM-Poland
DOC.TEXT: The European Community said Thursday it would send medical aid to Poland as part of an ongoing medical aid program in place since 1982. The 1989 package worth $2.9 million will buy medication and small medical supplies. The aid brings total EC medical aid to Poland since 1982 to $60.8 million. The medical supplies will be distributed by the Red Cross and a West German medical charity who have been distributing the EC's medical aid to Poland since 1982.
